objects.specification: A broad square floor panel spanning six meters by six meters, featuring a smooth, slightly textured finish in a neutral concrete grey tone, designed to provide a stable non-slip surface suitable for a professional fair booth environment.

A tall straight wall panel standing three meters high and six meters wide, with a clean matte white surface and subtle sharp edges, designed to form the northern boundary of the booth without any openings.

A tall straight wall panel standing three meters high and six meters wide, with a clean matte white surface and subtle sharp edges, designed to form the eastern boundary of the booth without any openings.

A tall straight wall panel standing three meters high and six meters wide, with a clean matte white surface and subtle sharp edges, designed to form the western boundary of the booth without any openings.
A three-meter-high wall segment two meters wide, rendered in matte white with crisp edges, serving as the left portion of the southern wall and leaving a clear entrance gap.
A three-meter-high wall segment two meters wide, rendered in matte white with crisp edges, serving as the right portion of the southern wall and leaving a clear entrance gap.
